Pre-Game Insights: The match between France and Italy will take place on Friday evening at 19:45 at the Parc des Princes stadium in the UEFA Nations League – Group A.
This is the first time France and Italy are facing each other in this competition.
The last official match between France and Italy was at Euro 2008, where Italy won 2-0.
The most recent confrontation was a friendly in 2018, which France won 3-1.
Both teams participated in Euro 2024 and managed to get out of the groups.
France was eliminated in the semifinals of Euro 2024 by Spain, with a score of 2-1.
France's squad did not undergo major changes compared to the 2024 European Championship.
Coach Didier Dechamps remained in office to qualify the team for the 2026 World Cup.
Italy had an evolution below expectations in Euro 2024, winning only the first match in the group against Albania with a score of 2-1.
Italy was eliminated by Switzerland in the round of 16 in Euro 2024.
Luciano Spalletti was reconfirmed as coach and hopes to qualify the national team for the 2026 World Cup.
